RelatedSentence: Kathy was preceded in death by her father , Leslie Harry Crosswhite .

Kathy is survived by her loving husband , Charles Douglas Doug Allison , and her two beautiful children , Charles Justin ( Karla ) Allison and Kristin Lee Allison ; her beloved grandchildren , the twins Lucas and Reily Allison ; her mother , Alberta Rosella Crosswhite ; and her brother , David Crosswhite and sister Carolyn ( Joe ) Wilson .

The Rapid City Journal offers obituaries as a way to inform friends throughout the area about the death of a person .
Obituaries also offer families the opportunity to provide a final public memorial .
Obituaries also offer families the opportunity to provide a final public memorial .
A standard obituary will list the name , age , residence of the deceased ; date of death ; branch of military service ; and funeral arrangements .
Obituaries for veterans will display an American flag .
A memorial obituary , for which there is a charge , allows family or friends to fashion the obituary to their particular specifications .
A memorial obituary , for which there is a charge , allows family or friends to fashion the obituary to their particular specifications .

In addition to information for the standard obituary , you may add information about the person 's life , work , community activities , awards or honors , special interests or anything else you feel is important .
